metas.title: Cheltenham Gold Cup Runners | Entries | Contenders | Declarations

metas.description: The full list of runners for the Cheltenham Gold Cup at the Cheltenham Festival including the jockeys and trainers for each entry.

page.content:
Cheltenham Gold Cup Runners 2016

The 2016 Cheltenham Gold Cup runners will be known much closer to the race in March of next year. One major contender is likely to be Coneygree who is the defending champion, while Willie Mullins is hoping that dual Festival winner Vautour will be a Gold Cup horse this winter.

Gold Cup 2016 Runners - Race Card
